text:
It is possible that a reframing of your time series forecasting problem may simplify it.
What are some alternate ways to frame your time series forecasting problem?
2.5 Unstructured vs. Structured
It is useful to plot each variable in a time series and inspect the plot looking for possible
patterns. A time series for a single variable may not have any obvious pattern. We can think of
a series with no pattern as unstructured, as in there is no discernible time-dependent structure.
